name: stellar-authenticator
description: An application to easily & securely sign Stellar transactions
author: MisterTicot

scripts.build-css: cat src/*.css | autoprefixer-cli -o web/authenticator.css && cp -fl node_modules/cosmic-lib/web/cosmic-lib.css web
scripts.build-misc: cp -fl AUTHORS LICENSE README.md package-lock.json web
scripts.build: for i in js css html misc; do npm run build-$i || return; done
scripts.check: npm run get && cp web/package-lock.json . && npm run ci && npm run build && cd web && git status
scripts.serve: npm run watch & cd web && live-server --no-browser
